Function.name: Hello
Function.description: Hello to the robot to test connection and obtain basic information.

Function.name: Interrupt
Function.description: Interrupt and reset the attitude values to default state immediately.

Function.name: LockPitchAngle
Function.description: Lock the pitch angle to the target value.

ParamItem.name: pitchAngle
ParamItem.description: Target pitch angle in degree. Positive value to tilt front and negative back.

Function.name: LockRollAngle
Function.description: Lock the roll angle to the target value.

ParamItem.name: rollAngle
ParamItem.description: Target roll angle in degree. Positive value to tilt right and negative left.

Function.name: LockYawSpeed
Function.description: Lock the yaw speed to the target value.

ParamItem.name: yawSpeed
ParamItem.description: Target yaw speed in degree per second. Positive value to rotate anti-clockwise and negative clockwise.

Function.name: LockVerticalAcceleration
Function.description: Lock the vertical acceleration to the target value.

ParamItem.name: verticalAcceleration
ParamItem.description: Target vertical acceleration in g. Positive value to lift and negative to descent.

Function.name: HoldPitchAngle
Function.description: Hold the pitch angle to the target value for a certain time.

ParamItem.name: pitchAngle
ParamItem.description: Target pitch angle in degree. Positive value to tilt front and negative back.

ParamItem.name: holdTime
ParamItem.description: Duration time in second to hold the target value.

Function.name: HoldRollAngle
Function.description: Hold the roll angle to the target value for a certain time.

ParamItem.name: rollAngle
ParamItem.description: Target roll angle in degree. Positive value to tilt right and negative left.

ParamItem.name: holdTime
ParamItem.description: Duration time in second to hold the target value.

Function.name: HoldYawSpeed
Function.description: Hold the yaw speed to the target value for a certain time.

ParamItem.name: yawSpeed
ParamItem.description: Target yaw speed in degree per second. Positive value to rotate anti-clockwise and negative clockwise.

ParamItem.name: holdTime
ParamItem.description: Duration time in second to hold the target value.

Function.name: HoldVerticalAcceleration
Function.description: Hold the vertical acceleration to the target value for a certain time.

ParamItem.name: verticalAcceleration
ParamItem.description: Target vertical acceleration in g. Positive value to lift and negative to descent.

ParamItem.name: holdTime
ParamItem.description: Duration time in second to hold the target value.

Function.name: MoveLinear
Function.description: Move towards a direction by certain distance.

ParamItem.name: directionAngle
ParamItem.description: Target direction angle in degree to self-coordinate.

Function.name: MoveVertical
Function.description: Lift or descent for a certain distance.

Function.name: RotateMagnetic
Function.description: Change the forward direction in accord to magnetic field.

ParamItem.name: magneticAngle
ParamItem.description: Target magnetic forward direction in degree to magnetic field coordinate.
